DialogueText.Text: Ah, its good to see you again! It feels like the world around us has gotten so crazy as of late... A simple talk is a much needed refresher.
I hope that things calm down once our work is finished. I'm looking forward to a nice vacation after we put a stop to the Selenic Order!

You haven't noticed? So much has changed in such a short span of time. The stains of the crusade have grown and festered as of late, and it feels as though new horrors awaken with every passing day...
I find myself longing for when things were calmer. Hopefully our efforts in stopping the Selenic Order can contribute to bring about more peaceful times.
